title: Asian Stocks Set for Muted Open After US Losses: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks were poised for a tepid open following technology-led declines on Wall Street. Precious metals were in focus after a slump in silver and gold from fresh all-time highs.
content: Asian stocks were poised for a tepid open following technology-led declines on Wall Street. Precious metals were in focus after a slump in silver and gold from fresh all-time highs.
